nodes.name: Fundraising

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.
 @param _donor The address we want to get the donations.
nodes.name: donationsOf
Fundraising

nodes.documentation:
@notice Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.
 @param _donor The address we want to get the donations.
nodes.name: donationsOf

params._deadline: number of seconds the fundraising period will be active/open
params._minimumGoal: the minimum amount of wei it must be collected in order to allow the owner to withdraw the funding

params._donor: The address we want to get the donations.

methods.constructor: Create the contract, initilize the fundraising attributes

donationsOf(address).notice: Returns the total amount of donations made by a specific address.

userdoc.notice: This contract will allow to make a crowd fundraising using ethers, please see the readme for the rules considered in the contract.
